gw.document

Class DocumentsUtilBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.document.DocumentsUtilBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DocumentsUtil, DocumentsUtilBase

    public abstract class DocumentsUtilBase
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper methods for the Document-related UI pages.

    • Method Detail

      • showEditButtons

        public static boolean showEditButtons()
        Checks to see if the Edit/Upload buttons should be displayed, and caches the result, since it depends on config parameters and thus won't change without a server restart.
        Returns:
        true if the Edit/Upload buttons should be displayed on the Documents list pages, false otherwise

      • showEditButtons

        public static boolean showEditButtons(Document document)
        Checks to see if the Edit/Upload buttons should be displayed, and caches the result, since it depends on config parameters and thus won't change without a server restart. It also will check the document entity to see if it is managed by DMS
        Parameters:
        document - document entity to check
        Returns:
        true if the Edit/Upload buttons should be displayed on the Documents list pages, false otherwise

      • renderDocumentContentsWithDownloadDisposition

        public static void renderDocumentContentsWithDownloadDisposition(java.lang.String fileName,
                                                                 DocumentContentsInfo documentContentsInfo)
        Render the given document contents directly back to the user's browser, rather than creating a temporary file on the server, using the content disposition indicated by the download attribute of the current widget.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The filename to be used.
        documentContentsInfo - The contents of the document to be displayed, for which the underlying InputStream is consumed and closed.

      • renderDocumentContentsDirectly

        @Deprecated(value="Uses gw.api.system.PLConfigParameters.DefaultContentDispositionMode directly for backwards compatibility. Use gw.document.DocumentUtil.renderDocumentContentsDirectly(String, DocumentContentsInfo, ContentDisposition)  or gw.document.DocumentUtil.renderDocumentContentsWithDownloadDisposition(String, DocumentContentsInfo) instead")
public static void renderDocumentContentsDirectly(java.lang.String fileName,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                DocumentContentsInfo documentContentsInfo)
        Deprecated. Uses PLConfigParameters.DefaultContentDispositionMode directly for backwards compatibility. Use or {@link #renderDocumentContentsWithDownloadDisposition(String, DocumentContentsInfo)} instead
        Render the given document contents directly back to the user's browser, rather than creating a temporary file on the server, using the configured default disposition, DefaultContentDispositionMode (see deprecation note below).
        Parameters:
        fileName - The filename to be used.
        documentContentsInfo - The contents of the document to be displayed, for which the underlying InputStream is consumed and closed.

      • renderDocumentContentsDirectly

        public static void renderDocumentContentsDirectly(java.lang.String fileName,
                                                  DocumentContentsInfo documentContentsInfo,
                                                  ContentDisposition contentDisposition)
        Render the given document contents directly back to the user's browser, rather than creating a temporary file on the server, using the specified content disposition
        Parameters:
        fileName - The filename to be used.
        documentContentsInfo - The contents of the document to be displayed, for which the underlying InputStream is consumed and closed.
        contentDisposition - ContentDisposition The inline or attachment explicit disposition with which to display the document. Or a default disposition will use the configured disposition, DocumentContentDispositionMode

                                          DocumentContentsInfo documentContentsInfo)
        Streams document content to temporary file on server
        Parameters:
        documentCreationInfo - DocumentCreationInfo if null, streams document contents to web response
        documentContentsInfo - DocumentContentsInfo for which the underlying InputStream is consumed and closed.

      • findOrCreateBean

        public static KeyableBean findOrCreateBean(Bundle bundle,
                                           java.lang.String entityTypeName,
                                           java.lang.String publicId,
                                           boolean markNonPersisting)
        This will attempt to find a bean with the correct type and public id, first in the bundle, then in the database, if not found it will create the bean. You can check if it was created by the New property on the bean.
        Parameters:
        bundle - the bundle to create the bean in and to search for the bean
        entityTypeName - the entity name
        publicId - the public id of the entity
        markNonPersisting - do not persist these objects
        Returns:
        the bean

                                           java.lang.String publicId,
                                           boolean markNonPersisting)

        Parameters:
        bundle - the bundle to create the bean in and to search for the bean
        entityType - the entity type
        publicId - the public id of the entity
        markNonPersisting - do not persist these objects
        Returns:
        the bean

        public static void evictNonPersistentDocument(Document bean,
                                              Bundle bundle)
        Expose this so that the non persistent document will be refreshed on next fetch. This should only be called in an afterCommit on a screen that updates an existing document metadata.
        Parameters:
        bean - the document to evict from bundle
        bundle - the bundle to evict the bean from

        Parameters:
        templateId - template id, null value will be passed to the plugin

        Returns:

      • getFileExtensionForDocument

        public static java.lang.String getFileExtensionForDocument(Document doc)
        This will return the file extension for the mime type of the document if any. Note that the configuration of mime types has a string, extension, that should have the leading decimal point. It is not checked here.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document to extract the mime type from
        Returns:
        either the extension or an empty string.

      • getFullFilename

        public static java.lang.String getFullFilename(Document doc)
        This will return the file extension for the mime type of the document if any. Note that the configuration of mime types has a string, extension, that should have the leading decimal point. It is not checked here.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document to extract the mime type from
        Returns:
        either the extension or an empty string.

        Parameters:
        doc - the document
        Returns:
        ContentDisposition

      • markFileInputForClientInitiatedDownload

        public static void markFileInputForClientInitiatedDownload(java.lang.String fileWidgetId)
        For use in widget Gosu actions to mark the specified FileInput widget such that a special command will be rendered during the response instructing the client to download the WebFile content of the FileInput using the default content disposition
        Parameters:
        fileWidgetId - String the FileInput id

      • markFileInputForClientInitiatedDownload

        public static void markFileInputForClientInitiatedDownload(java.lang.String fileWidgetId,
                                                           ContentDisposition contentDisposition)
        For use in widget Gosu actions to mark the specified FileInput widget such that a special command will be rendered during the response instructing the client to download the WebFile content of the FileInput using the specified ContentDisposition
        Parameters:
        fileWidgetId - String the FileInput id
        contentDisposition - ContentDisposition the disposition of the download, i.e., inline, attachment, or system-configured default.

      • markFileInputsForClientInitiatedDownload

        public static void markFileInputsForClientInitiatedDownload(java.lang.Object... fileDownloadSpecs)
        For use in widget Gosu actions to mark the specified FileInput widget(s) such that a special command will be rendered during the response instructing the client to download the WebFile(s) content(s) of the FileInput(s) using the specified ContentDisposition(s)
        Parameters:
        fileDownloadSpecs - Object... array of Objects, where each element is either:
        • String a FileInput id to download using the system-configured default, OR
        • a two element array where:
          • the first element is the String FileInput id to download, and
          • the second element is the ContentDisposition to use
        Example (in Gosu): 
                                  
                              markFileInputsForClientInitiatedDownload({
                                 'widgetId',                                  // download with system-default content-disposition
                                 {'widgetId', ContentDisposition.DEFAULT},    // download with system-default content-disposition
                                 {'widgetId', ContentDisposition.INLINE},     // download with 'inline' content-disposition
                                 {'widgetId1', ContentDisposition.ATTACHMENT} // download with 'attachment' content-disposition
                              })
        This method will throw an exception if any of the arguments are invalid.
